faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Explore answers to common questions about our school, including admissions, fees, and academic programs.

questions.question: What languages are used for instruction at the school?
questions.answer: The primary language of instruction at our school is Persian, while English and Arabic are also included in the curriculum to enhance students' language skills.

questions.question: What is the registration process, and what are the required documents and timeline?
questions.answer: To register at the school, parents need to visit the school in person and provide required documents such as birth certificate, ID card, health certificate, passport-sized photo, and previous academic records. For detailed information and to confirm the necessary documents, please contact the school before visiting. Registration typically occurs in June and July, and late registrations will incur an additional penalty fee.

questions.question: What are the tuition fees and what do they cover?
questions.answer: Tuition fees vary depending on the grade level and chosen specialization. The fees cover educational costs, textbooks, extracurricular activities, and basic school services. For more precise details, please contact the school's finance department.

about_us.main_descripton: The Salman Farsi Educational Complex stands as a beacon of Iranian education in the United Arab Emirates, carrying a legacy of achievement and dedication. This institution narrates a rich history marked by tireless efforts, unwavering commitment, and innovative strides in the field of education.

sections.title: In the heart of Dubai, where innovation and heritage intertwine, a remarkable educational story unfolds.
sections.content: In the year 1957, Iranian School Dubai, the first Iranian school in the Emirates, proudly raised the flag of knowledge and education. The flame ignited that year not only bestowed the light of learning upon Iranian children in the Emirates but also laid the foundation for a fruitful journey in the path of education.

sections.title: Over time, Iranian School Dubai witnessed remarkable transformations and advancements
sections.content: In 1963, the secondary school was added to the institution, and its name was changed to Iranian High School Dubai. The year 1972 also saw the establishment of Abu Ali Sina Guidance School.

sections.title: In 1995, a new chapter unfolded in the history of this institution.
sections.content: Shahid Rajaee Elementary School, Buali Boys Guidance School, and Shahid Mohammad Bagher Sadr High School united under a single complex, giving birth to Salman Farsi Educational Complex.

sections.title: Salman Farsi Complex was built on land gifted by Sheikh Mohammed bin Rashid Al Maktoum, the Emir of Dubai.
sections.content: With its modern and advanced educational facilities, including 26 classrooms, a library, a multipurpose hall, laboratories, computer workshops, sports fields, and more, the complex provided an ideal environment for students to pursue knowledge.

sections.title: Today, Salman Farsi Complex is recognized as one of the leading Iranian schools in the Emirates.
sections.content: Supported by a team of experienced and dedicated teachers, students from this complex receive education in various fields, including science, humanities, and vocational studies, at the elementary, middle, and high school levels, preparing them for entry into prestigious universities or the job market.

sections.title: The graduates of this complex stand as a testament to its remarkable success.
sections.content: Each year, over 90% of twelfth-grade students graduate and go on to pursue higher education at reputable universities around the world or join the UAE job market.

sections.title: The story of Salman Farsi Complex is a story of perseverance, dedication, and commitment to knowledge and education.
sections.content: A journey that began with Iranian School and continues to flourish. A journey that nurtures a well-educated and competent generation for the future of Iran and the Emirates.

sections.title: Features and Facilities
sections.content: The Salman Farsi Educational Complex is a modern learning environment, housing:
list: Two two-story buildings with 26 classrooms equipped with smartboards.
A library with a collection of 4,500 books.
A multipurpose hall for prayers, assemblies, and examinations.
State-of-the-art science laboratories for elementary, middle, and high school levels.
Three computer labs with over 40 computers, fully equipped.
Sports facilities, including football, handball, volleyball, and basketball courts.

sections.title: Graduates of the Complex
sections.content: Every year, over 90% of 12th-grade students graduate from the complex. A significant number of these graduates pursue higher education at prestigious universities worldwide or join the UAE workforce, showcasing their skills and potential.

sections.title: A Message of Pride
sections.content: The Salman Farsi Educational Complex embodies a proud history and a lasting commitment to excellence. As a symbol of Iranian achievement in education, the complex continues to be a model of sustainable development, collective effort, and high aspirations. We take immense pride in nurturing generations who shine brightly in academic, cultural, and social arenas, carrying the name of Iran to the global stage.

ehsan.heading: Ehsan
ehsan.title: Ehsan – Where Every Ability Finds Its Path
ehsan.description: Since 2008, Ehsan at the Salman Farsi Educational Complex has been a welcoming space for Students of Determination. Through expert support and a nurturing approach, we empower every student to unlock their potential and shape a brighter future.
ehsan.expert_description: A team of specialists providing high-quality education and rehabilitation.
ehsan.comprehensive_description: Ensuring equal opportunities for every student to succeed.

guidance.heading: Elementary School
guidance.title: From Foundational Excellence to Future Success
guidance.description: The primary education section (Grades 1 to 6) offers two classes per grade, focusing on strong academics and advanced language programs in Arabic and English taught by native-speaking experts. With experienced teachers, innovative methods, and smart classrooms, we ensure an engaging and personalized learning experience.

middle_school.heading: Middle school
middle_school.title: Talented Educators, Modern Facilities, and Advanced Methods
middle_school.description: Middle school (grades 7 to 9) at Salman Farsi School offers a modern learning environment with smart classrooms and expert teachers. Each grade has two classes, supported by advanced teaching methods.The school provides extracurricular programs, science labs, sports facilities, and amenities, ensuring students grow academically and personally while preparing for future challenges.
middle_school.key_description: We focus on consistency and timely progress for student success.

highschool.heading: High school
highschool.title: Experienced Educators, Specialized Facilities, and Cutting-Edge Programs
highschool.description: High school (grades 10 to 12) at Salman Farsi School is guided by a team of experienced educators, many of whom are university professors specializing in science, humanities, mathematics, physics, and web development.

list.title: Advanced Science Instruction
list.description: Professors provide expert guidance in biology, chemistry, and physics for academic success.

list.title: Web Development Excellence
list.description: Students gain hands-on experience in modern computer labs tailored for web development.

list.title: State-of-the-Art Science Labs
list.description: Fully equipped labs enable practical experiments in core sciences.

list.title: Tailored Extracurricular Programs
list.description: Diverse activities support students in humanities, mathematics, and technology.

meetus.title: Come and meet us
meetus.description: Register for a meeting with our School Leadership Team and visit our incredible campus.

main.introduction_title: Introduction to Ehsan – Salman Farsi Educational Complex
main.introduction_description_1: The Salman Farsi Educational Complex is committed to supporting Students of Determination (SOD) in their journey toward growth and development. Established in 1995, the complex has welcomed hundreds of students over the years. In 2008, it launched its first specialized department, named Ehsan, to provide educational and rehabilitation services to students with special needs.
main.introduction_description_2: The primary goal of Ehsan is to recognize the potential and capabilities of all students while creating opportunities for their enrichment and learning. We believe in equality and equal opportunities for everyone, striving to provide a supportive environment where students can shape a brighter future for themselves.
objectives_list: To offer learning experiences that enable students to achieve their full potential.
To create a positive environment where students can build self-confidence and self-respect.
To value the needs and perspectives of Students of Determination and address their aspirations.
To ensure that students with special needs can integrate into society with appropriate ethical values and vocational skills.
To develop students—not just those with special needs but all students—into responsible citizens equipped with proper social etiquette, ethics, and values to contribute to their future.
main.speech_title: Speech Therapy – A Key Rehabilitation Service in Ehsan
main.speech_description: The speech therapy unit within Ehsan focuses on assessing and treating speech and language disorders in students. This service plays a crucial role in enhancing students' communication skills, as speech and language are vital tools for interaction.
area_list: Delayed Speech and Language Development: For children who lack an environment conducive to speech and language development or have intellectual disabilities.
Articulation Disorders: Arising from coordination issues in tongue muscles, hearing impairments, or sensory weaknesses in the oral region.
Stuttering: Speech characterized by repetition, prolongation, pauses, or blocks, sometimes caused by vocabulary deficiencies or neurological disorders.
Learning Disorders: Including challenges related to reading and writing.
main.services_title: Services Provided by the Speech Therapy Unit:
services_list: Planning and precise implementation of treatment programs.
Initial evaluation and determination of the severity of speech and language disorders.
Enhancing sensory-motor systems and foundational speech skills, including chewing and swallowing.
Improving students' communication skills using behavioral, cognitive, and linguistic approaches.
main.services_description: With a combination of dedication and expertise, the Ehsan department supports students with special needs, helping them confidently navigate their path to success and empowerment.

terms.admission_link: Read the Complete Code of Conduct
terms.admission_description: Prior to registration, it is mandatory to read and accept the Code of Conduct. By registering at Salman Farsi School, you agree to adhere to all school policies.

privacy_policy.privacy_policy_description: At [Your Company Name], we value your privacy and are committed to protecting your personal information. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and protect your data when you visit our website [Your Website URL] or interact with our services.

privacy_policy_list.title: Information We Collect
privacy_policy_list.content: We may collect personal information, such as your name, email address, phone number, and any other information you provide through forms or other methods of communication. We may also collect non-personal information such as your IP address, browser type, and usage data through cookies and similar technologies.

privacy_policy_list.title: How We Use Your Information
privacy_policy_list.content: We use the information we collect to:
list: Respond to your inquiries and support requests.
Send you newsletters, promotional materials, or other information you have requested (with your consent).
Monitor and analyze website usage to improve user experience.
Comply with legal obligations and enforce our terms of service.

privacy_policy_list.title: Cookies and Tracking Technologies
privacy_policy_list.content: Our website uses cookies to enhance your experience and analyze site traffic. You can control cookie settings through your browser, but please note that disabling cookies may affect some features of the website.

privacy_policy_list.title: Sharing Your Information
privacy_policy_list.content: We do not sell, trade, or rent your personal information to third parties. However, we may share information with trusted partners or service providers who assist us in operating our website, conducting business, or providing services to you, as long as they agree to keep your information confidential. We may also disclose your information if required by law or to protect our rights.

privacy_policy_list.title: Data Security
privacy_policy_list.content: We take reasonable precautions to protect your personal information from unauthorized access, use, or disclosure. However, no method of transmission over the internet or electronic storage is 100% secure. While we strive to protect your information, we cannot guarantee absolute security.

privacy_policy_list.title: Your Rights
privacy_policy_list.content: Depending on your location and applicable laws, you may have the right to:
list: Access, correct, or delete your personal data.
Object to the processing of your personal data.
Withdraw consent for certain processing activities.
privacy_policy_list.content_2: If you wish to exercise these rights, please contact us at [Your Contact Information].

privacy_policy_list.title: Third-Party Links
privacy_policy_list.content: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. Any changes will be posted on this page with an updated date. We encourage you to review this policy periodically to stay informed about how we are protecting your information.

privacy_policy_list.title: Contact Us
privacy_policy_list.content: If you have any questions or concerns about this Privacy Policy or our practices, please contact us at:[ email school]

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Explore answers to common questions about our school, including admissions, fees, and academic programs.

questions.question: What languages are used for instruction at the school?
questions.answer: The primary language of instruction at our school is Persian, while English and Arabic are also included in the curriculum to enhance students' language skills.

questions.question: What is the registration process, and what are the required documents and timeline?
questions.answer: To register at the school, parents need to visit the school in person and provide required documents such as birth certificate, ID card, health certificate, passport-sized photo, and previous academic records. For detailed information and to confirm the necessary documents, please contact the school before visiting. Registration typically occurs in June and July, and late registrations will incur an additional penalty fee.

questions.question: What are the tuition fees and what do they cover?
questions.answer: Tuition fees vary depending on the grade level and chosen specialization. The fees cover educational costs, textbooks, extracurricular activities, and basic school services. For more precise details, please contact the school's finance department.

questions.question: How does the school handle student transportation?
questions.answer: The school provides safe and reliable transportation services for students. The bus services include well-equipped buses with skilled drivers, and routes are closely monitored. For more information and to register for transportation, please contact the school's transportation department.

questions.question: Does the school have a program for students who require special support?
questions.answer: Yes, our school offers specialized programs to support students with special needs. These programs include individualized teaching and psychological and social support to help students succeed in the educational environment.

questions.question: What are the school working hours and official holidays?
questions.answer: The school operates from Monday to Friday, from 7 AM to 4 PM. Saturdays are reserved for administrative tasks. Official holidays include summer vacation, Nowruz break, Ramadan break, and national holidays.

main.title: Salman Farsi Educational Complex
main.title_description: A Thriving Environment for Growth and Learning
main.description: The Salman Farsi Educational Complex offers a dynamic setting designed to foster comprehensive student development in academic, athletic, cultural, and social spheres. Equipped with modern infrastructure and state-of-the-art facilities, the complex is dedicated to nurturing creative, committed, and capable individuals prepared to excel in various aspects of life.

classroom.title: Smart Classrooms and Modern Educational Tools
classroom.description: Each classroom is outfitted with smart boards, advanced projectors, and audio-visual systems, enabling interactive and engaging learning experiences. By integrating cutting-edge educational technologies, the complex enhances learning quality and actively involves students in the educational process.

labs.title: Advanced Scientific Laboratories
labs.description: The complex features fully equipped laboratories for chemistry and biology, providing a practical and stimulating environment for experiments, research projects, and skill enhancement in the sciences.

library.title: Comprehensive Library
library.description: With thousands of printed books, the library offers a quiet, resourceful space for study and research. Digital search tools and access to scientific resources further support students in achieving academic and research excellence.

sports.title: Sports Facilities and Recreation Areas
items: Facilities for activities such as football, volleyball, basketball, and table tennis
sports.conclusion: These amenities, coupled with organized sports programs, encourage physical health and teamwork.

cultural.title: Cultural and Artistic Activities
items: Training in arts such as painting, music, and theater

prayerHall.title: Prayer Hall and Religious Programs
prayerHall.description: The prayer hall provides a welcoming environment for congregational prayers, Quranic sessions, and ethical discussions, fostering students' spiritual and moral growth.

healthClinic.title: Health Clinic and Wellness Services
healthClinic.description: Supervised by qualified medical professionals, the health clinic offers:
healthClinic.conclusion: These services aim to maintain and improve the physical and mental health of students.

counseling.title: Counseling and Guidance Services
counseling.description: Professional counselors support students academically, emotionally, and socially through:

cafeteria.title: Hygienic Cafeteria with Nutritious Meals
cafeteria.description: The cafeteria ensures access to healthy, nutritious meals and snacks, promoting balanced diets to sustain student energy and overall well-being.

specialNeeds.title: Support for Students with Special Needs
specialNeeds.description: Specialized services cater to students with unique needs, including:

safety.title: Safety and Crisis Preparedness
safety.description: The complex adheres to rigorous safety protocols, providing courses on crisis management, fire safety, and earthquake preparedness to equip students for emergencies.
safety.keyFocusDescription: We empower students with the knowledge and skills to handle emergencies effectively, preparing them for any unexpected situation.
